revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Berry Forest |image = [[File:Berry Forest.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Berry Forest. |tokens = 1,750 |location = Sevii Island 3. }} '''Berry Forest''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 18,120 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !!
